AFNI Integration for fMRI Analysis

Source: R/afni.R
afni-package.Rd

This file serves as the main entry point for AFNI integration functionality. The implementation has been modularized into the following files:

Files

  • afni_hrf_specs.R - HRF specifications and constructors

  • afni_stim_files.R - Stimulus file creation and management

  • afni_build_stims.R - Building AFNI stimulus objects

  • afni_command_generation.R - 3dDeconvolve command generation

  • afni_contrasts.R - Contrast and GLT handling

  • afni_construct.R - Construct methods for AFNI terms

  • afni_s3_methods.R - S3 methods for AFNI term classes

  • afni_lm.R - Linear model interface functions

Developed by Bradley Buchsbaum.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
